sentences.sContent: Lagoon Reef is one of the best resort hotels.
sentences.sCn: 潟湖礁是最好的度假酒店之一。

sentences.sContent: His punishing work schedule had made him resort to drugs.
sentences.sCn: 他那累人的工作日程已经使他不得不求助于毒品了。

synos.tran: 凭借，手段；度假胜地；常去之地
求助，诉诸；常去；采取某手段或方法

phrases.pCn: 万不得已（作为最后手段）

trans.tranCn: 凭借，手段；度假胜地；常去之地
trans.tranOther: a place where a lot of people go for holidays

trans.tranCn: 求助，诉诸；常去；采取某手段或方法
trans.tranOther: If you resort to a course of action that you do not really approve of, you adopt it because you cannot see any other way of achieving what you want
